transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to reschedule an appointment I have coming up.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopedics. Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, this is Maria Santos. I'm calling to reschedule my appointment.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Maria. Can you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Just to confirm, can you please spell your first and last name for me?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Of course, it's Maria Santos. M-A-R-I-A S-A-N-T-O-S.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look up your record using a phone number you have on file with us? If so, please provide that number. If you're not sure, let me know, and we can confirm your name and date of birth again.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm. Your phone number is five five five eight seven six four three two one and your date of birth is July twenty second nineteen seventy nine. Is that correct?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can't pull up your record right now, so I'll connect you to our patient's support team for help with rescheduling. Please stay on the line.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Live transfer isn't available right now since this is a demo.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I understand. Could you help me reschedule my appointment for next week instead? I'm available Monday, Tuesday, or Friday, any time.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'll make sure our clinic support team follows up with you as soon as possible about rescheduling your appointment. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'll document your request and let our clinic support team know you want to reschedule for next week with availability on Monday, Tuesday, or Friday. They'll get back to you as soon as they can. Have a great day.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you so much. Have a great day! Goodbye!
